content: /*<![CDATA[*/ $('#title').html($('meta[name=map-description]').attr('content')); /*]]>*/ Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.5 March 4, 2024—Service Gateway Firmware Version 3.0.5 provides enhanced security and management capabilities. This update includes the following changes: This update adds support for restarting the appliance via the Service Gateway Management app on the Trend Vision One console. This update adds a bug fix for configuring the Network Time Protocol after upgrading the Service Gateway appliance. © 2025 Trend Micro Incorporated. All rights reserved.Search Knowledge Base
